message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is about building resources for Semantically-Informed Machine Translation, which falls under the category of Natural Language Processing (NLP). The paper specifically focuses on building a modality lexicon and automated modality taggers, which are important components of NLP. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper involves building automated taggers, which could fall under the categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves improving machine translation, which could fall under the categories of cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
